test.query: select k from (select number % {modulos} as k from numbers(100000000)) where k >= 5 and k < 255 order by k
select k from (select number % {modulos} as k from numbers(100000000)) where k >= 5 and k < 350 order by k
select k from (select number % {modulos} as k from numbers(100000000)) where k >= 5 and k < 20000 order by k
select k from (select number % {modulos} as k from numbers(100000000)) where k >= 5 and k < 65536 order by k
select k from (select number % {modulos} as k from numbers(100000000)) where k >= 5 and k < 100000 order by k
